commit message: v0.4.0: fixed a couple typos
v0.4.0: fixed a capitalization error in burning

v0.4.0: Refactored strength requirements, also changed how they scale

Also refactored class armor a bit so that it is upgradeable
v0.4.0: Removed a bunch of legacy logic
v0.4.0: big restructure to item sprite sheet
v0.4.0: Refactored item status handler, now independent of sprite sheet
v0.4.0: refactored artifacts storing their image reference

v0.4.0: Rebalanced base weapon scaling

- tier 2, 3, and 4 weapons deal more damage at base (most significant for tier 3)
- all tiers gain 1 more max damage per upgrade
v0.4.0: reworked/added the 5 basic swords
v0.4.0: refactors and rebalancing to existing weapons
v0.4.0: refactored weapons with changed stats to use none-constant values
v0.4.0: implemented hand axe
v0.4.0: added the ability for weapons to give DR, gave it to quarterstaff
v0.4.0: reworked dagger
v0.4.0: fixed an inconsistency in knuckleduster code
v0.4.0: fixed a number of bugs regarding tengu
v0.4.0: fixed an alignment issue in tengu level logic
v0.4.0: loads of item implementation
v0.4.0: lots of new weapon polish
v0.4.0: fixed an alignment issue in rankings windows
v0.4.0: fixed a bug that would cause 0 hp targets to never take damage

v0.4.0: rebalanced ring of force around new equipment

also some refactoring to it
v0.4.0: refactored extra reach on weapons, adjusted statues to use new weapon properties
